Though we come to know Bayern for the superstars they possess, the German champions also have a number of talented younsters in their ranks. Gianluca Gaudino is one such individual, Alankrith Shankar has this Scout Report on him.

The pre-season is well underway for the German Domestic Champions, Bayern Munich as Pep Guardiola, prepares his squad for the season. One of the youngsters making a lot of good noises during the pre-season is German Gianluca Gaudino. The 17 year old is the son of Maurizio Gaudino, the midfielder who was
